name: Watermelon Caprese Appetizer
author: Nicole Cox
summary: A refreshing appetizer for the summer, my family loved this so much they ate more than a serving each. Also great for those who love the flavor of caprese but aren't huge fans of tomatoes.
ingredients: 1 small watermelon, fruit removed with a melon baller
1 (8 ounce) package fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into small pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Trim basil leaves into small circles about 1 inch in diameter
Thread watermelon and mozzarella cheese on toothpicks, sandwiching a basil leaf in between
Pour olive oil and balsamic vinegar over toothpicks
Sprinkle salt and black pepper on top
